rubric_id.description: Unique identifier for the rubric (e.g., position_clarity, factual_accuracy_meta).

rubric_name.description: Human-readable name for the rubric (e.g., Position Clarity, Factual Accuracy (Meta-Cognition)).

description.description: A brief explanation of what this rubric measures.

score.description: The score value for this level (e.g., 0, 1, 2, 3).

description.description: Text describing what this score level means for this rubric.

levels.description: An array of objects, each representing a score level.
